heading: HR01960
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY CONDEMNING THE MURDER OF ASSISTANT STATE PROSECUTOR MADONNA JOY EDNACO TANYAG AND TEN OTHER STATE PROSECUTORS SLAIN SINCE 2016, TO URGE THE CONCERNED AUTHORITIES TO WORK TOWARDS THE SWIFT DELIVERY OF JUSTICE FOR THE VICTIMS AND THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES, AND TO EXHORT THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE GREATER SECURITY FOR STATE PROSECUTORS
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01960
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY CONDEMNING THE MURDER OF ASSISTANT STATE PROSECUTOR MADONNA JOY EDNACO TANYAG AND TEN OTHER STATE PROSECUTORS SLAIN SINCE 2016, TO URGE THE CONCERNED AUTHORITIES TO WORK TOWARDS THE SWIFT DELIVERY OF JUSTICE FOR THE VICTIMS AND THEIR BEREAVED FAMILIES, AND TO EXHORT THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE GREATER SECURITY FOR STATE PROSECUTORS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY ON 2018-07-30
